[Friday, June 18 2021] dont know bout evangelion, but the art feels so nostalgic
idk, rape is ehh, the art style is good but also got slight whiplash from the story changes.

Day 1- Manga 5*
At first it seems to be just some erotic drawings of Evangelion girls but after a while we can see a story. Obviously I still couldn't read it but the art was the best untill now. I'll give it a strong 8/10.
Of course, Evangelion had to be, and what more but a rape HAHA
The initial art was very good 8/10 , however all good things must come to and shitty generic old rape ruined my boner 2/10
Thank God it's not Naruto
